children.value: to display metadata, often with field values that link out.
and one or many descriptions. Each

properties.code:
<RecordFields
  fields={[
    {
      term: "Source of Description Note",
      description: [
        { text: "Description based on: Vol. 1, no. 1 (Mar. 2012); title from cover." },
        { text: "Latest issue consulted: Vol. 1, no. 3 (Sept. 2012)." }
      ]
    },
    {
      term: "Previous Title",
      description: [
        { text: "Wing span (Melbourne, Vic.)", href: "#" },
        { text: "Bird observer (Hawthorn, Vic.)", href: "#" }
      ]
    }
  ]}
/>

children.value: more condensed styles. Will remove the horizontal zebra styling and extra spacing.

properties.code:
<RecordFields
  condensed
  fields={[
    {
      term: "Source of Description Note",
      description: [
        { text: "Description based on: Vol. 1, no. 1 (Mar. 2012); title from cover." },
        { text: "Latest issue consulted: Vol. 1, no. 3 (Sept. 2012)." }
      ]
    },
    {
      term: "Previous Title",
      description: [
        { text: "Wing span (Melbourne, Vic.)", href: "#" },
        { text: "Bird observer (Hawthorn, Vic.)", href: "#" }
      ]
    }
  ]}
/>

children.value: to render your own anchor that will be used by descriptions that have

properties.code: ({data.text})} />
